dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take a confrontational approach, becoming direct and forceful in their argument.
Your FarTwin will seek to find common ground, working collaboratively with others to resolve the issue.

dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new information and ideas?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully analyze and evaluate information, seeking to understand the underlying principles.
Your FarTwin will focus on applying new information and ideas in a hands-on, experiential way.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves through writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use language that is creative, expressive, and often metaphorical.
Your FarTwin will prioritize clarity and brevity in their writing, avoiding flowery or unnecessary descriptions.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be confident and assertive in their interactions, taking the lead in group settings.
Your FarTwin will tend to observe from a distance, preferring quieter, more low-key social interactions.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on visual arts, such as painting or drawing.
Your FarTwin will prioritize performing arts, such as music or dance.

dimensions.label: Technical Ability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technical tasks and problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use logical reasoning and step-by-step approaches to solve problems.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and instincts-based solutions, often bypassing traditional analysis.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize their schedule?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be adaptable and open to changing plans, prioritizing flexibility over structure.
Your FarTwin will rely on a rigid schedule and routine, valuing predictability above all else.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach uncertainty and risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out new experiences and challenges, taking calculated risks.
Your FarTwin will prefer to play it safe, minimizing risk and avoiding uncertainty whenever possible.
